citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
The Attending Veterinarian (AV) has not visited the facility since 11/7/2024. The facility’s program of veterinary care states
that the AV will visit the facility “at least twice annually”. Regularly scheduled visits by the AV are necessary to help
ensure the health and well-being of all of the animals and that the mechanism of direct and frequent communication are
occurring. Each research facility shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-
time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of
veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the research facility.
Correct by 2/16/2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.33(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
The Attending Veterinarian (AV) has not visited the facility since 11/7/2024. The facility’s program of veterinary care states 
that the AV will visit the facility “at least twice annually”. Regularly scheduled visits by the AV are necessary to help 
ensure the health and well-being of all of the animals and that the mechanism of direct and frequent communication are 
occurring. Each research facility shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-
time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of 
veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the research facility. 
Correct by 2/16/2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
